articles.title: Udaipur Murder Live Updates: Anti-Terror Agency NIA Takes Over Probe
articles.description: The murder of a tailor yesterday sparked tension in Udaipur, Rajasthan. The killers - Gos Mohammad and Riyaz - entered Kanhaiya Lal's shop at a crowded market in the city and slit his throat with a cleaver, and even filmed the incident.
articles.content:

articles.title: Back in limelight, Governor Bhagat Singh Koshyari and his constant run-ins with MVA govt
articles.description: The constant face-off between the MVA government and Governor has also resulted in the Maharashtra Assembly Speaker's post being vacant now for more than a year, since Nana Patole resigned in February 2021 to take over as the state Congress president.
